types.html:
tupinamba (invariable)

  1. (anthropology) Tupinambá
    Synonym: topinambou
    • 1955, Claude Lévi-Strauss, chapter IX, in Tristes Tropiques, Plon, published 1993, →ISBN, page 89; republished as John & Doreen Weightman, transl., Tristes Tropiques, Penguin, 2011, →ISBN:
      Je foule l'Avenida Rio-Branco où s'élevaient jadis les villages tupinamba, [...]
      — I walked up the Avenida Rio-Branco, once a site occupied by Tupinamba villages, [...]
